com.cmput301f19t09.vibes.models

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301f19t09.vibes.models.UserManager

  • public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages a list of all Users that have been used in components of the app. Each User object is given a snapshot-listener.

      • registerUser

        public static void registerUser(java.lang.String user_id)
        Create a new User object for user_id, add a snapshot listener to that User
        Parameters:
        user_id - The UID (in firebase) of the User to create

      • unregisterUser

        public static void unregisterUser(java.lang.String user_id)
        Remove a User from registeredUsers and remove the SnapshotListener from the User
        Parameters:
        user_id - The UID of the User to remove

      • addUserObserver

        public static void addUserObserver(java.lang.String user_id,
                                   java.util.Observer observer)
        Add an observer the the User with UID
        Parameters:
        user_id - The UID of the User to add an Observer to
        observer - The Observer to add to the User

      • removeUserObserver

        public static void removeUserObserver(java.lang.String user_id,
                                      java.util.Observer observer)
        Remove the Observer observer from the User with UID user_id
        Parameters:
        user_id - The UID of the User to remove the Observer from
        observer - The Observer to remove

      • removeUserObservers

        public static void removeUserObservers(java.lang.String user_id)
        Remove all Observers from the User with UID user_id
        Parameters:
        user_id - The UID of the User to remove Observers from

      • getUser

        public static User getUser(java.lang.String user_id)
        Return the User with UID. If the User has been registered, return it from registeredUsers, if it hasn't then register it first.
        Parameters:
        user_id - The UID of the User to return
        Returns:
        The User object with UID user_id

      • registerCurrentUser

        public static void registerCurrentUser(java.util.function.Consumer<User> callback)
        Register a new User and set that User as the main application User. Set the mainUserUID to the FirebaseAuth UID of the currently signed-in User
        Parameters:
        callback - A callback for when the main User has been registered
